precision - recall ( PR ) curve and aver.from sentence: In , we show the precision - recall ( PR ) curve and average precision ( AP ) for our model compared with many other state - of - the - arts on these three subsets .

state - of - the - art performance.from sentence: We show the discontinuous ROC curve at compared with , and our method achieves the state - of - the - art performance of TPR = 98.7 % given 1000 false positives .

PR curve.from sentence: We show the PR curve at compared with , and our method achieves a new the state - of - the - art performance of AP = 99.0 .

best performance.from sentence: As we can see , our method achieves the best performance on the hard subset , and outperforms the current state - of - the - art by a large margin .

state - of - the - art and almost perfec.from sentence: As shown in compared with , our method achieves state - of - the - art and almost perfect performance , with an AP of 99.60 .

comparable.to: most recent state - of - the - art

performance.from sentence: Our performance on the medium subset is comparable to the most recent state - of - the - art and the performance on the easy subset is a bit worse since our method focuses on learning hard faces , and the architecture of our model is simpler compared with other state - of - thearts .
